column3:
<X1e>Jira<X04>
Let me tell you a story from
ancient times.

Long ago, in the Age of Light,
the gods dwelt upon our world.

But there came a day when the
demon Agnija appeared. The world
was veiled in dark light, and the
gods fled into the heavens.

Yet the long and dreadful Age of
Darkness had its end as well.
And the departed gods put people
like themselves upon the earth.

They foretold that when Agnija
returns, heroes will appear,
and that devastation will never
again recur.

The Crystalspire is one remnant ofthat ancient civilization.
